snippet: The United States International Trade Commission, which ruled a patent had been violated, said it was issuing a ban for a some devices on AT&T’s network.
abstract: United States International Trade Commission rules that Apple had violated one of Samsung's patents, ordering ban on some older devices that work on AT&T's network; Apple plans to appeal decision.
lead_paragraph: The United States International Trade Commission, which ruled a patent had been violated, said it was issuing a ban for a some devices on AT&T’s network.

headline.main: Apple Violates Samsung Patent, U.S. Trade Panel Says
headline.print_headline: Apple Violates Samsung Patent, U.S. Trade Panel Says
